channel.title: HELP With doors!

item.title: HELP With doors!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

HELP I want to make the legends guild only accesible to admins i found the code for the mining guild which is only level 60 mining } else if (objectID == 2113) { //Mining guild stairs if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= 60) { stairs = 3; skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; stairDistance = 1; } else { sendMessage("You need 60 mining to enter the mining guild."); }
I tried editing it to fit the legends guild but it wouldnt work please help and i dont want it to be stairs i want it to be a door (the ID for the door is 2624)

Read full topic
